page.title: 08FARMING
page.content: LAST PAGE ON FARMS IN OUR GRID GRID REF.:70-43 1. LLWYN Y CRAIR Owner: ARWEL JONES Land:100 acres STOCK:300 sheep and 8 cows. A reduction in number of cows kept in 1985 following a very long,dry season in 1984. Silage. Has farmed here for 30 years following in father's footsteps. Not many losses in l985. COMMENTS* These are all rather small farms of approx. 100 acres and are used for sheep-grazing mainly. Some have very rough mountain pasture which means a good deal of hard work shepherding during seasons. Weather generally is mild with quite a lot of rin in winter months. Some summers (l984) are unusally dry creating problems of adequate pasture. Some, like TECWYN WILLIMS,Frondirion are part-time farmers. >>>END
